name: Bally Jump
summary: Mobile game with one-touch control where only the best say it's easy to play. Its breathtaking 3D visuals and effects will make you play for hours! For starters, try beating your top score. Then, challenge your friends and compare your record with worldwide players on the ranking list!

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: NEW GAME! BALLY JUMP - 3D BALL HOP MAGIC TILES
